title: Hypnotic Billy - The Complete Collection
description: When Billy's ailing grandfather passes on his old pocket watch and a book on hypnosis, the 20-year old has no idea how much it will change his sex life.Soon Billy finds himself using his new found knowledge of hypnosis to seduce woman after woman from his sister's friends to MILFs to BBW and even a nun. Is there any length Billy will not go to?CONTAINS EROTIC MATERIAL. FOR ADULTS ONLY.
author: Lucian Carter
